metadata.title: CVE-2017-6363 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
** DISPUTED ** In the GD Graphics Library (aka LibGD) through 2.2.5, thereis a heap-based buffer over-read in tiffWriter in gd_tiff.c. NOTE: thevendor says "In my opinion this issue should not have a CVE, since the GDand GD2 formats are documented to be 'obsolete, and should only be used fordevelopment and testing purposes.'"

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6363` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgd-tools - 2.2.5-4ubuntu0.5
libgd3 - 2.2.5-4ubuntu0.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libgd2 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.2.5-4ubuntu0.5').
